snippet.title: Company of Crime - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Company of Crime is out now!

Company of Crime is a tactical turn-based criminal empire-builder that places you in the heart of 1960s London. Will you build an influential criminal empire, or head up an elite Scotland Yard task force and crack down on the rising tide of corruption? Case out targets, then dive into the melee with your hand-picked team of gangsters or detectives.

Get the game on Steam: https://bit.ly/CoC_Steam_page

Platforms: PC

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#CompanyOfCrime #Strategy
